dimensions: H x diam.: 21.4 x 7.6 cm (8 7/16 x 3 in.)
title: Vase
description: Tall cylindrical vessel curving in at base to slightly undercut foot and curving in at top to indentation marking off thick, roundest, out-curving lip of wide mouth. Tiger-eye glaze [browns with iridescent gold streakings]. Bird and wave painted under glaze.
name: Vase
